name: Behind The Screen (itch) (Amy V)
description:
Prior to making my game, I tried to format it as if it were a story-game and utilized a branching tree to recreate this.  To be more specific, I wanted my game to have a set amount of choices that can result in different endings. To do this, multiple branches were needed since each branch can lead to an end or another route. I specifically chose this structure because I thought it would be the most efficient at telling the story, and it forces the player to be involved. The structure contributes to the experience since I want the player to be pushed into making their own choices with the goal that they could strive to reach a happy ending, depending on their mood or feelings.

~~~~~~
